schema.description:
指定返回的**LocalName**参数的语言。取值：
* **zh-CN**：中文
* **en-US**：英文

默认值：**en-US**

RDSRegion.description: 可选的地域和可用区列表。

RegionEndpoint.description: 地域对应的服务接入地址（Endpoint）。更多信息，请参见[服务接入点](~~610370~~)。

LocalName.description:
地域名称。根据**AcceptLanguage**参数的值返回不同的语言。以cn-hangzhou地域为例的返回示例如下：
* **AcceptLanguage**为**zh-CN**：华东1（杭州）
* **AcceptLanguage**为**en-US**：China (Hangzhou)

ZoneName.description:
可用区名称。根据**AcceptLanguage**参数的值返回不同的语言。以cn-hangzhou-j可用区为例的返回示例如下：
* **AcceptLanguage**为**zh-CN**：杭州 可用区J
* **AcceptLanguage**为**en-US**：Hangzhou Zone J

400.errorMessage: A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.
Your account quota limit is less than 0, please recharge before trying to purchase.

404.errorMessage: Only Chinese (zh-CN) and English (en-US) are allowed.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "1AD222E9-E606-4A42-BF6D-8A4442913CEF",
  "Regions": {
    "RDSRegion": [
      {
        "ZoneId": "cn-hangzhou-j",
        "RegionEndpoint": "rds.aliyuncs.com",
        "LocalName": "China (Hangzhou)",
        "RegionId": "cn-hangzhou",
        "ZoneName": "Hangzhou Zone J"
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":"{
    "RequestId": "7463B73D-35CC-4D19-A010-6B8D65D242EF",

    "Code": "UnsupportedOperation",
    "Message": "The specified action is not supported."
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeRegionsResponse>
<RequestId>1CE1DC20-7EFC-464F-9583-0AB8915C5697</RequestId>
<Regions>
    <RDSRegion>
        <ZoneName>Hangzhou Zone H</ZoneName>
        <ZoneId>cn-hangzhou-h</ZoneId>
        <RegionId>cn-hangzhou</RegionId>
        <LocalName>China (Hangzhou)</LocalName>
        <RegionEndpoint>rds.aliyuncs.com</RegionEndpoint>
    </RDSRegion>
    <RDSRegion>
        <ZoneName>East China 1 MZone10 H+I</ZoneName>
        <ZoneId>cn-hangzhou-MAZ10(h,i)</ZoneId>
        <RegionId>cn-hangzhou</RegionId>
        <LocalName>China (Hangzhou)</LocalName>
        <RegionEndpoint>rds.aliyuncs.com</RegionEndpoint>
    </RDSRegion>
    <RDSRegion>
        <ZoneName>East China 1 MZone8 F+G</ZoneName>
        <ZoneId>cn-hangzhou-MAZ8(f,g)</ZoneId>
        <RegionId>cn-hangzhou</RegionId>
        <LocalName>China (Hangzhou)</LocalName>
        <RegionEndpoint>rds.aliyuncs.com</RegionEndpoint>
    </RDSRegion>
</Regions>
</DescribeRegionsResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看可选的地域和可用区
summary: 该接口用于查询所有RDS地域的详情。
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
- RDS SQL Server
- RDS MariaDB
